title: Greater New York Watch: News Digest
text:
Manhattan Defense: Dismiss Case Against Dewey Leader A defense lawyer for Dewey & LeBoeuf LLP’s ex-chairman urged a judge to toss financial fraud charges against his client, saying prosecutors did nothing more than offer “scant and ambiguous” evidence.
The comments in a court filing Thursday come after three months of a trial in which prosecutors sought to convince jurors that the former chairman, Steven Davis, and two other... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
